body: I absolutely love this artstyle because of how realistic the design of the girls look in comparison to other Loli porn

Not my kinda loli art either.   As for the ppl who panic over this?  This is FICTION.   These are ILLUSTRATIONS of FICTIONAL CHARACTERS.   Now if these were actual photographs of real children/minors, hell, I'd even call the po-po on my ass xD.   Rape and murder can be free range in FICTION.   In reality, don't even think about it, because in the real world there be consequences, and real people who get hurt.
